reviews.review: Dentro del saco de juegos favoritos

De los mejores juegos que haya comprado, por un lado tiene una historia super interesante y escenarios muy bien trabajados y por otro lado la banda sonora que compone a este juego es una de las mejores a mi parecer y con un final muy bello y el que opine lo contrario lo veo a la salida
For a game that's over 10 years old by this point, you genuinely wouldn't be able to tell. Portal 2 is an absolute classic, everybody NEEDS to experience this game at least once in their life.
An absolute masterpiece which takes the innovative concepts of the first game and builds a city on top of them, tied together with an incredibly enjoyable and witty narrative
игра просто супер и интересная и в тоже время экшен комедия всем рикамендую на часок так другой перекинути  хватет
best game i have ever played. ( apart from tf2 and portal 1 of course) u NEED TO BUY THIS if u do I promise that you will never be done with the lore and humor
amazing challenging game very goood as a dual player

Интересная, долгая и сложная игра!
Интересна как  и одиночная, так и кооперативная игра. Все загадки по своему сложны, одни плюсы, рекомендую!
11/10
potato is a true
интересная сюжетная головоломка. Так ещё есть и кооператив

At first I didn't see why this game was so highly rated, but now I do.

It's a ton of fun, CO OP and Single player have two different stories which I like, and they're both extremely fun. Lot's of fun puzzles that are rewarding and even very very fun to play and solve.

I don't like puzzle games, but this is the one and only exception, trust me it's worth it.

It's always such a pleasure
Remember when you tried
to kill me twice?
Oh how we laughed and laughed
Except I wasn't laughing
Under the circumstances
I've been shockingly nice

You want your freedom?
Take it

but
Now I only want you gone

(Maybe not quite as heavy)
Now little Caroline is in here too
One day they woke me up
So I could live forever

will never happen to you

You've got your
short sad
life left

I'll let you get right to it
Now I only want you gone

Oh, did you think I meant you?
That would be funny
if it weren't so sad
Well you have been replaced
I don't need anyone now
When I delete you maybe
I'll stop feeling so bad

Go make some new disaster
That's what I'm counting on
You're someone else's problem
Now I only want you gone
Now I only want you gone
Now I only want you... gone

Ну игра нормальная, особенно для 2011 года.
Сюжет затягивает, но есть куда расти.
Особенно понравилась многопользовательская игра, можно позалипать вместе с друзьями.
Кароче рекомендую!

So good I finished it in one sitting!

Buy it! Its worth every cent spent!

Рекомендую пройти, хоть игра вышла в 2012 году.

10/10
Слишком короткая, а так игра отличная

I played this game at the beginning of 2017 with my young son watching and helping me over my shoulder and it was a blast.  The humor and the story are great as well as the puzzles unique to having a portal gun.
One of the best games I've ever played
Realised me and my friends are stupid. 10/10
Tremenda obra maestra, definitivamente vale la pena
Игра отличная в ней есть всё что нужно было в первой части длительность игры в 3 раза больше чем в Portal , тут и графика лучше и персонажи и модули и боссфайт в конце

Игра для мега умов.
Если вы без мозга пожалуйста не покупайте.
В игру можно научится играть где то за день.
Плюсы: картошка Глэдос, кооператив (для меня он шикарен) и наконец то свобода вместе с кубом компаньоном.
Минусы: убрали весёлое радио( и иногда попадаются дауны рандомы в коопе

Portal 2 é um jogo emocionante, inteligente, e cheio de carisma.
Não falta personalidade em Portal 2. A narrativa tem mistério, tragédia, piadas engraçadas, e um tom irônico que o permeia completamente... E isso apenas com 3 personagens que possuem dialogo completo por toda a campanha! A maior conquista de Portal 2 é a sua incrível capacidade de contar sua história somente pela sua ambientação, que rapidamente envolve o jogador pelo design criativo e impactante das vistas e salas que visita. Neste triunfo, também ajuda que o jogador tem que possuir total consciência dos seus arredores caso queira resolver todos os quebra-cabeças do jogo, e os mesmos podem alternar entre desafios complexos da sua compreensão das mecânicas do videogame, ou testes de seus reflexos cheios de adrenalina. Portal 2 é uma parte definitiva da cultura dos jogos eletrônicos, e com boa razão.
its pretty good and I have a lot of fun

Игру прошел быстро.Итоги : графика-топ, сюжет-топ, оптимизация-топ, физика-топ. Игра очень крутая, когда прошел одиночную кампанию, есть онлайн. Прошел онлайн, есть карты сообщества. Итог : игра очень крутая!
Everything about this game is perfect, even after years
lubisz być robotem, rozbijać się o ściany, bływać w kwasie i myśleć? to gra dla ciebie. DO CIEBIE MÓWIE JUAN MENDES

Если вы любитель головоломок или хотите весело провести время с друзьями, то эта игра точно понравится вам! Уровни довольно сложные будут с 6-7 главы, сюжет завораживает, рекомендую поиграть :)

Magnificent work of art, following the first game, changing a bit the gameplay, while still maintaining the core essence of what makes Portal good. Must buy classic.
The acid humor is even better in this sequel, loved it.
